channel.title: couuas.pp.ua
channel.description: Personal portfolio and blog of a creative designer/developer.

item.title: TRICYS Performance Bottleneck Analysis and Optimization
item.description: An in-depth analysis of TRICYS simulation program bottlenecks, proposing the 'Compile Once, Run Many' strategy to solve crashes and efficiency issues in large-scale concurrency.

item.title: About Wasker Vue
item.description: Exploring the evolution of the Wasker ecosystem from static templates to the 3D + AI production version.
